channel.title: Can't run client
channel.description:
I can't run a client (Not a webclient) Like Rovascape or Coldfire. I have tried all sorts of things with the PATH and CLASSPATH but cant figure it out. I just tried doing JDK in it again but still nothing. I push run.bat and it opens quickly then shuts down.
Any ideas?
PATH [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;[/code]
CLASSPATH [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]

item.title: Can't run client
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

jdk1.6.0_13\bin;

Change The Run Thing Into The Right JDK You Downloaded.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't run client
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

I have had this happen to me before i have no answer on how to fix it but i know it’s most liekly to happen in a laptop so if you have a laptop try using a desktop computer instead. If you’re using a desktop computer than when you’re running it it’s just not running the correct files.

Read full topic
